notesStmt.note: Folio 459r: a responsum of R. Yosef of Orleans on the subject of a divorce document. Natan Leṿi Adilkint (?): inscribed, folio 2r.A description of the manuscript with a statement on the value of the text: folio 1v (paper flyleaf).
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: Mordekhai, i.e. the Talmudic expositions and decisions of Mordecai ben Hillel ha-Kohen Ashkenazi.

supportDesc.foliation: Hebrew foliation in the upper left-hand corner of each recto.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Ashkenazi semi-cursive script of the 14th century. Ya῾aḳov ben Yosef Blan: inscribed in the colophon (folio 459v).

binding.p: Post-1600. Black thick leather. Spine title: 'Mordecai Ben Hillel. Talmudic Expositions & Decisions. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Additional 19,972.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Solomon Netter of Tiberias: bought from him by the British Museum on 14 October 1854: inscribed (folio [460v].
